title: For some athletes, the Olympics aren't just a chance to compete — they're an opportunity to defect
content:
1. For some athletes, the Olympics aren't just a chance to compete — they're an opportunity to defect  The Washington Post
  2. Belarusian sprinter 'safe' in Japan, granted Polish visa after home country allegedly tried to forcefully remove her from Olympics  Yahoo Sports
  3. The Guardian view on Belarus: an Olympic athlete joins the exodus  The Guardian
  4. Opinion | Olympic sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya takes a stand and reminds us of Belarus's injustices  The Washington Post
  5. Belarusian athlete accuses home team of forcing her out of Tokyo Olympics after criticising coach  South China Morning Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 一部のアスリートにとって、オリンピックは単に競争する機会ではなく、欠陥を作る機会でもあります。
对于一些运动员来说，奥运会不仅仅是一个竞争的机会--它们是一个缺陷的机会。
對於一些運動員來說，奧運會不僅僅是一個競爭的機會--它們是一個缺陷的機會。
